I thought magnet links were supposed to be harder to track? Apparently not. Comcast letter, third one this year, looks like I'm losing internet. Lucky if I'm not in court soon. Thanks everyone, it's been a wonderful 10 years or so, but I'm afraid I'm done here thanks to this one.

@felesar2
Magnet links have nothing to do with tracking. You can blame yourself for not knowing what the fuck you were doing or for listening to idiots. Magnet links save the site bandwidth and server space. They also make it easier for proxy websites. And instead of getting the torrent file from thepiratebay, they make you get the torrent file from other people, just like the video file.

The other reason you are getting letters is because of who you voted for in government combined with how corrupted you have let your government become. Because it seems like Hollywood is your real unelected government, and politicians just their puppets. Really again, only yourself to blame.

Your kids will thank you for not changing anything about it and passing on the problem to them. I can't blame you, revolution is dirty and a lot of work. Good thing there is burgers and tv to keep these problems out of your head.

It seems freedom of information, or other human rights like that don't exist where you live (look it up, it's something people have fought for, against their government). If you had this they could not disconnect you or you would be in trouble with online tax, email for work, wiki for kids learning in school, ect and other life necessities. But your government doesn't think that is a right you should have.

And to be real, i don't think you have earned them either. On the plus side however. These disconnections seem to be ridding the internet of idiots...

And yes, i do think you are everything that is wrong with the western world. Lets check how long it takes for you to forget about this post. Just to prove my point.
